title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard to create a nested class, the context is not set correctly.
EB: The new class wizard should correctly set the context for nested classes.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the new class wizard. 
2. Choose the option to create a nested class. 
3. Follow the wizard steps to complete the creation of the nested class. 
4. Verify that the context is set correctly for the nested class.
